title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the GridMaster system, including functional and non-functional requirements, performance goals, scalability, security considerations, and integration with existing systems or third-party services. Conduct stakeholder interviews and workshops to capture comprehensive requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the GridMaster system, including components, modules, and their interactions. Define the system's high-level design principles and patterns.

title: Develop Data Management Strategy
description:
Define the data management strategy, including database design, data modeling, and data integration approaches for handling complex electricity distribution network data. The strategy should consider the following aspects:

1. Data storage requirements: Estimate the volume and velocity of data to be handled, and determine the appropriate database technology (e.g., relational, NoSQL, time-series) based on the data characteristics.

2. Data modeling: Design the data models and schemas to represent the complex relationships and hierarchies present in electricity distribution networks, ensuring data integrity and efficient querying.

3. Data integration: Define the mechanisms for integrating data from various sources, such as smart meters, sensors, and external systems, ensuring data consistency and reliability.

4. Data security and privacy: Implement measures to protect sensitive data, such as customer information and network configurations, adhering to industry regulations and best practices.

5. Data archiving and retention: Establish policies and procedures for data archiving, backup, and retention, considering legal and operational requirements.

6. Data access and querying: Develop strategies for efficient data retrieval, analysis, and reporting, considering the diverse needs of stakeholders (e.g., network operators, maintenance teams, billing systems).

title: Implement Automation and Optimization Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms and techniques for automating the management of electricity distribution networks and optimizing their performance.

title: Design User Interfaces - GridMaster
description: Design and develop user interfaces for monitoring, managing, and interacting with the GridMaster system. Ensure usability, accessibility, and adherence to industry standards, best practices, and our defined design system. Collaborate with project team members during the design process.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and implement comprehensive security measures, access controls, and data protection mechanisms to ensure the GridMaster system's security, data integrity, and compliance with industry standards and regulations. This includes, but is not limited to, implementing secure authentication and authorization mechanisms, encrypting sensitive data at rest and in transit, implementing role-based access controls, and implementing security monitoring and logging mechanisms. Additionally, consider integrating single sign-on (SSO) for seamless user experience, and perform regular security audits to maintain system security.

title: Develop Deployment and Monitoring Strategies
description: Define strategies for deploying the GridMaster system in production environments, including containerization, orchestration, monitoring tools, and automated deployment pipelines for ensuring high availability, resilience, and efficient updates.

title: Create Testing and Quality Assurance Plan - Revised
description: Revise and expand the existing testing and quality assurance plan to include unit tests, integration tests, performance tests, acceptance criteria for the GridMaster system, and a clear outline of the test scenarios. Additionally, ensure the plan addresses potential edge cases, scalability, and resilience requirements.

title: Develop Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides to facilitate system maintenance and user adoption.
